Text: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1193138/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1 score 7.5/10 from 169,871votes drama romance, With a job that has him traveling around the country firing people, Ryan Bingham leads an empty life out of a suitcase, until his company does the unexpected: ground him.  George clooney , vera farmiga, anna kendrick, Ryan Bingham is a corporate downsizing expert whose cherished life on the road is threatened just as he is on the cusp of reaching ten million frequent flyer miles and just after he's met the frequent-traveler woman of his dreams. Country:USA Language:English Release Date:23 December 2009 (USA),Budget:$25,000,000 (estimated) ,Production Co:Paramount Pictures, Cold Spring Pictures, DreamWorks Pictures ,Runtime:109 min  | 108 min
